short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This script adds a BibTex import functions to ASEP interface. Able to parse: @article, @book, @incollection and @inbook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ASEP is a bibliographical database of the Czech Academy of Sciences (https://asep.lib.cas.cz/arl-cav/en/index/). Adding new entry is, however, only possible via a web form where one needs to type in a number of fields manually. This extension creates a new element in the ASEP form page. This enables user to load bibliographical data from a BibTex file and fill thus a majority of fields automatically. Currently it is able to parse @article, @book, @incollection and @inbook BibTex types.
